Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Salil Hotel Sukhumvit - Soi Thonglor 1, you'll be centrally located in Bangkok, convenient to J Avenue Thonglor and Lumpini Park. This hotel is within close proximity of Emporium Shopping Complex and Gateway Ekamai Mall.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 111 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and minibars. Your room comes with a Select Comfort bed. 32-inch LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature hair dryers and bathrobes.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a sauna, and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in the lobby. Guests can get around on the shuttle (surcharge), which operates within 0.5 mi.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, express check-in, and express check-out. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

J Avenue Thonglor - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Emporium Shopping Complex - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Gateway Ekamai Mall - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Benjasiri Park - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
K Village - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Embassy of Hungary - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Bangkok University - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Embassy of Argentina - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Embassy of India - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Stock Exchange of Thailand - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Queen Sirikit National Convention Center - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Terminal 21 Shopping Mall - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Benjakiti Park - 2.3 km / 1.5 mi
Bangkok Hospital - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Embassy of Pakistan - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi

The preferred airport for Salil Hotel Sukhumvit - Soi Thonglor 1 is Bangkok (BKK-Suvarnabhumi Intl.) - 19 km / 11.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
